distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for xen fixes one issue.

This security issue was fixed:

- CVE-2018-3639: Prevent attackers with local user access from extracting
  information via a side-channel analysis, aka Speculative Store Bypass (SSB),
  Variant 4 (bsc#1092631).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: Systems with microprocessors utilizing speculative execution and speculative execution of memory reads before the addresses of all prior memory writes are known may allow unauthorized disclosure of information to an attacker with local user access via a side-channel analysis, aka Speculative Store Bypass (SSB), Variant 4.
notes.title: CVE description
